FuncDef:
The diameter monitor-key command configures a Diameter monitoring key in a service policy.
The undo diameter monitor-key command deletes a Diameter monitoring key configured in a service policy.
By default, no Diameter monitoring key is configured in a service policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a Diameter monitoring key.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4294967294.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a Diameter monitoring key in a service policy, run the diameter monitor-key command. After the command is run, the device checks whether the monitoring key in a received Diameter quota is the same as the configured Diameter monitoring key. If they are different, the device does not process the quota.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
